info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This was the second time I stayed at Shahid's place. I have now stayed at this place for closer to 6 months, and this time I stayed for 2.5 months. Shahid's place already feels like home to me. Shahid is very responsive and flexible and attended to all my requests. Shahid also found me this amazing driver for my use during my stay. The place is as secure and safe as it can get in Bangladesh. It is located in a gated community, and has a nice park, a walkway built around a small lake, an ATM, 2 supermarkets, pharmacies and a coffee shop within 2 minutes of walking distance. It is also very close to Gulshan, and all the nice cafes and restaurants. Shahid's place is self-contained and I enjoyed my stay at Shahid's place very much and will stay there again when I visit Bangladesh next year.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Small Studio for a couple. Nice, quiet, clean & very safe place. Thanks

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: That's my fourth time in Shahid's room in Dhaka. He is a great host, always very helpful and communicates swiftly. The room is beautiful and well furnished. If you're looking for a quiet place away from the hectic Dhaka, then this is your place! Thanks again!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Great, safe and centrally located place. It was super easy to check in and everyone in the building was very friendly and helpful. I'll definitely come back and stay with Sabih if I'm back in Dhaka again. :)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Good for short-term

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I had a wonderful time staying in Sabih and Shahid’s place. The room was spacious and comfortable, with all the amenities to cook, do laundry, and work from home, which was exactly what I needed.
The location is in a very safe and peaceful area of Dhaka — after weeks in other much more frenetic areas it was a treat to wake up to birdsong rather than car horns!
Mr Shahid and his wife, and the housekeepers, were so attentive. I was ill during my stay and they went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed and was cared for.
I recommend staying here to anyone looking for a cosy oasis in Dhaka, and hope to be back!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
The place is very clean and quiet. The neighbourhood is safe and centrally located so it's very easy to get anywhere. The owner Mr. Sabih is a lovely person who was very helpful with tips such as how to get the local transport, or where the nice cafe is or where I should go shopping. Check in was very fast and easy.
Bed is wide and comfortable. There is a room service and towels etc. get changed frequently.
There's a lift so it's great for having some luggage. Kitchen is also available so one can cook easily. Also a nice beanbag is a plus! Definitely recommend Cozy Studio Dhaka! Will come back in future!

rating_comment: Second time staying here and it was just as easy as the first. All the amenities that you need, clean, secure and convenient.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This place looks exactly like the images shared, so you can judge exactly what you are signing up for . DOHS Baridhara is one of the safest neighborhoods and safety is assured. The place is very comfortable and quite with zero hassles.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Shahid was great. He was welcoming, a wealth of information, and very responsive. The place itself is well-located, clean, and a nice refuge from the busy streets of Dhaka. Would definitely stay here again in the future.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I stayed in this room for a little over three months. The place is very secure, one of the safest places in Dhaka, constantly guarded by forces. It is kind of a central and convenient place if you have to go around Dhaka. I found it easy to travel from Baridhara DOHS to the places I had to visit, which were scattered around Dhaka. Gulshan 2 is very close, and I used to walk there from DOHS. There are several coffee shops within walking distance. There are also two mini-marts and a park with a jogging track inside the DOHS.
The room itself was very stylish, clean and comfortable. Mr. Sahid was always approachable and helpful. And the staff is also very polite and helpful. I enjoyed my stay there and will go back if I visit Bangladesh again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I stayed at the property for 5 nights. The place is in a very secured zone. Just remember that if you have a car that does not have a sticker (for cars that are registered within the zone), you may have to take some detour to get in/ out to the area. Other than this issue everything was perfect. The staffs at the property are very nice. The place is clean and the host is very responsive to your request. I would recommend everyone who is looking for a secured place to stay in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: It's ok services quite good and the communication is very very good

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: great host,,

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Definitely a top pick among all type of accommodations available. Quiet, secured with everything you need at walking distance. Groceries, restaurants from snacks place to most expensives’ , ATM, shoppings.... a little bit of a journey by local transport to reach Old Dhaka ( about one hour) mainly because of the horrendous traffic but really appreciable to know that at the end of the day you will relax and review your photos in a quiet comfortable place. And if you do not want to go out for dinner, you have all appliance to cook at home. Did I mention a private and secured parking? We are cycletouring and that option was well appreciated. Very close to the airport so you won t be stressed by any traffic jam on your way to or from the airport. Do not underestimate that aspect :)
We extended our stay 2 times and would never thought to look for anything else

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · November 2018
rating_comment:
I'm sure you've read the amazing reviews all through, I'll just sum it up by saying, id love to be here each and every time im in dhaka.
its clean and secure for sure, but its exactly as you see it in the pics.
i congratulate the warm owners on a great place and wish them the best so that they can keep it the way it is.
